## About Me

I am a fourth year Ph.D. candidate in the [Department of Statistics and Data Science](https://statistics.northwestern.edu/) at [Northwestern
University](https://www.northwestern.edu/). My research involves using Bayesian ideas such as Markov chain Monte Carlo to develop new methods and applications for approximating pseudolikelihood functions. 

## Interests

* Bayesian statistics
* Likelihood analysis
* Data science
* Machine learning
